title: It looks like EA is already considering Dead Space 2 and 3 remakes

title: Selling 2 million copies in 24 hours, Sons of the Forest is definitely a hit

title: Star Warped was a parody that went through funny and came out the other side

title: Overwatch 2 director confirms what we already knew: the 'meta' isn't all that important
